divs: Sighting Detailsjust about every night the craft has been coming in my back yard, I see it coming over the tree tops and then stop and hoover. Usually there is only one, but last night there was two of them. They have been coming closer to my house, hovering and then taking off. I am not sure if a being came in my house when this happen, but something did and it look like a person - a bright glowing person and then it was gone. The being just looked like a regular person, accept it was glowing. at first I was scared but, now it does not bother me. I guess they want to see what our world looks like. no photo's taken I am handicap and as soon as i get up to take a picture, they are gone.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Dacula
There were no other sightings in Dacula on or around December 1st 2012
Summary: just about every night it appears, hoovering and then takes off
